sentence: Lisa Scheller and Kevin Dellicker, the two Republican candidates for the 7th Congressional District seat, will participate in their first debate on April 1 at Northampton County Community College.
author: Morning Call Staff
title: Lisa Scheller, Kevin Dellicker to hold first debate in 7th Congressional Republican race

author: Lindsay Weber
title: Lisa Scheller raises 10 times more than Kevin Dellicker in Republican primary for 7th District, but both lag far behind Susan Wild in fundraising
